figure.head: Table 2:
figure.figDesc: Examples of queries used for evaluation.
figure.table:
Shashin-o mêru-de okuritai
(I want to send a picture via email)
Aikon-o desukutoppu-ni tôroku shitai
(I want to register a new icon on the desktop)
Jushin-shita mêru-o mtablenagara henshin mêru-o sakusei-suru hôhô
(How to write a reply mail while looking at the incoming mail)
